items.quote: The documents from the Resume Creator are professional and allow candidates to stand out. The templates are clear and they help showcase the most important information.
items.author: Megan McBride

items.quote: Uptowork's resume creator made my documents look much better. I am very happy with the template that I found, because it helped me make a professional resume.
items.author: Ashley Price

items.quote: The online resume creator offers eye-catching templates, and the tips help you create an effective resume. I landed a number of internship interviews.
items.author: Angelica Roth

errors.invalidPassword: La contraseña debe contener al menos 8 caracteres, con al menos 1 numero y 1 letra.
errors.noAccount: No existe una cuenta asociada a este correo.
errors.accountSocialExist: Ya existe una cuenta asociada a este correo, intenta ingresando por Facebook o Google
errors.emailPassNoMatch: La contraseña y el usuario no coinciden, verifica tu clave e intentalo nuevamente.
errors.badResetCode: El código para restablecer la contraseña ya no es válido, vuelve a solicitar restablecer la contraseña.
